markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Viper Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=4032) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 62</row>

**Frequency**
once per minute

</column>

---

You move and attack with a swiftness that most can't follow. You Stride and then Strike. Your movement doesn't trigger reactions based on movement.
name: Viper Strike
